name: NRK.no - Moerk by cfjoelstad
description:
Moerk - Dark/Mørk theme for NRK.no

Laget for eget bruk da mørke themes ofte er mindre slitsomt på øynene.

Dark theme for NRK.no - A more eye friendly dark theme.
additional_info:
Version 0.8 - 18 August 2019
* Minor fixes to general classes.
* Fixes to "valgomat"

Version 0.7.1 - 22 May 2017
* Small misc. fixes.

Version 0.7 - 09 May 2017
* Updates for new NRK frontpage.

Version 0.6.4
* Fixed full page articles.

Version 0.6.3
* Fixed white BG for European championship related articles.

Version 0.6.2
* Minor fixes for full-page articles.

Version 0.6.1
* Fixed factbox.

Version 0.6
* Fixed tipbox.

Version 0.5
* Fixed recent news (http://www.nrk.no/nyheter/)
* Fancy new name: Moerk.

Version 0.4
* Initial publish
* Fixed recent news (sidebar widget).


Version 0.1 > 0.3
* Fixed backgrounds, font colors and menus.
* Fixed nrk sidebar widgets.
